text: Melanothrix fumosa is a moth in the family Eupterotidae. It was described by Swinhoe in 1905. It is found on Borneo. Adult males have a complete white bar on the forewings, while females have an extensive yellow area on each wing distally.The Moths of Borneo ==References== Category:Moths described in 1905 Category:Eupterotinae
title: Melanothrix fumosa
